meanings.definition: The quality or state of being informal.
meanings.sent1: The informality of the gathering made everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the informality of our weekly meetings.
meanings.sent3: The informality of the dress code led to some interesting fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was marked by an informality that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The informality of the picnic added to its charm.

meanings.sent5: The informality of the meeting allowed for open discussions.
